entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
